name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Engine Switcher: Google, Perplexity & Brave

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily switch between Google, Perplexity, Brave, and DuckDuckGo search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

Google-Perplexity Search Switcher is a convenient Chrome extension that enhances your search experience by allowing you to seamlessly switch between Google and Perplexity search results. With a sleek, pill-shaped button integrated directly into the search pages, you can effortlessly toggle between the two search engines without the need to manually re-enter your query or navigate away.

Changelog:

Version 1.2.0 - October 23, 2024
- Added Support for DuckDuckGo

Version 1.1.0 - October 19, 2024
- Added Support for Brave Search

Version 1.0.0 - October 15, 2024
- Initial Release


Key Features

- Seamless Switching: Instantly switch between Google and Perplexity search results with a single click.

- Automatic Query Transfer: Your search query is automatically transferred between platformsâ€”no need to copy and paste.

- Integrated Interface: A stylish, floating pill-shaped button appears on both Google and Perplexity search pages.

- User-Friendly Design: Clean and modern UI with intuitive icons representing each search engine.

- Consistent Experience: The button remains consistently accessible, enhancing your workflow without interruption.

How It Works

When you perform a search on Google, a pill-shaped button appears at the bottom right corner of the page, featuring both the Google and Perplexity icons.

The Google icon is highlighted, indicating the current platform.

Click on the Perplexity icon to switch to Perplexity.ai with the same search query automatically populated.

On Perplexity.ai, the process is mirrored:

The Perplexity icon is highlighted.

Click on the Google icon to return to Google search results for the same query.
The extension intelligently detects your current platform and search query, providing a smooth and efficient transition between the two.

Why Use Google-Perplexity Search Switcher?

- Efficiency: Save time by eliminating the need to manually re-enter search queries across different platforms.
- Enhanced Research: Easily compare results from both search engines to get a comprehensive understanding of any topic.
- User Experience: Enjoy a non-intrusive, aesthetically pleasing interface that enhances your browsing without cluttering your screen.

Permissions

- Active Tab: Needed to read the URL and extract the search query for seamless switching.
- Web Access: Access to https://www.google.com/* & https://www.perplexity.ai/* to insert the floating button.

Privacy Policy

- No Data Collection: This extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data.
- Local Operation: All functionalities operate locally within your browser.
- Permissions Used Solely for Functionality: Permissions are strictly used to enable the core features of the extension.

How to Use

- Install the Extension: Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install the Google-Perplexity Search Switcher.

- Perform a Search: Use Google or Perplexity.ai as you normally would.
Use the Switcher:

- Look for the floating pill-shaped button at the bottom right corner of the search results page.

- The button displays both the Google and Perplexity icons.
- The icon corresponding to the current platform is highlighted.

Switch Platforms:

- Click on the non-highlighted icon to switch to the other search engine.
- Your current search query will be automatically transferred.
